---
title: Update an account
---

# Update an account

https://docs.swan.io/guide/manage-accounts-and-ibans#configure-your-account

- `accounts` query
- `updateAccount` mutation
- `allowSdd` mutation
- `denySdd` mutation

intro

## Guide {#guide}

1. Call the `generateAccountStatement` mutation.
1. 

## Mutation {#mutation}

ðŸ”Ž [Open the mutation in API Explorer](https://explorer.swan.io?%3D%3D&tab=api)

```graphql {4-6} showLineNumbers
mutation GenerateAccountStatement {
  generateAccountStatement(
    input: {
      accountId: "af194fb0-0203-4cdc-81d2-f4e3172aabc0"
      openingDate: "2023-11-01T00:00:00.000Z"
      closingDate: "2024-11-01T00:00:00.000Z"
    }
  ) {
    closingDate
    createdAt
    fees {
      currency
      value
    }
    id
    openingDate
    period
    status
    updatedAt
  }
}
```

## Payload {#payload}

The mutation returns all of the requested information as well as the status `Pending` (line 13).

```json {} showLineNumbers
{
  "data": {
    "generateAccountStatement": {
      "closingDate": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000Z",
      "createdAt": "2024-01-19T10:08:17.082Z",
      "fees": {
        "currency": "EUR",
        "value": "0"
      },
      "id": "9b2b9e4f-36ed-40a8-bf8d-7d86bea8c256",
      "openingDate": "2023-11-01T00:00:00.000Z",
      "period": "Custom",
      "status": "Pending",
      "updatedAt": "2024-01-19T10:08:17.084Z"
    }
  }
}
```
